content.description: Climb the orange patina face adjacent the right arête of the pillar to a 2-bolt anchor with rings. Tricky slab start and thin face/slab for the rest. Mostly bolt protected but there are a couple of spots where you will need to place gear. Lower off.
content.protection: A couple small-medium wires, a small cam (offset works best), an optional 2.5-3.5” piece, 8 bolts, 2-bolt anchor with rings.
content.location: Located above and between 4:20 Wall and Inconsiderate Wall. This is an obvious orange patina covered pillar. Many 3rd to 5th class approaches exist. Best approached by climbing the Higher 4:20 Wall. The route "Hey Girl! You Hungry?" serves as an excellent approach or descent.

content.description: Climb good looking left-leaning finger/hand crack up to a 2-bolt anchor with rings. Lower off.
content.location: Located above and between 4:20 Wall and Inconsiderate Wall. Many 3rd to 5th class approaches exist. Best approached by climbing the Higher 4:20 Wall. The route "Hey Girl! You Hungry?" serves as an excellent approach/descent.
